runs.comm: sees it full and wide and doesn't have the slightest second thought about throwing his bat. Smeared over point
fulish on off stump, Shehzad kept to his crease and nudges the ball towards midwicket. Good thing he got bat to that, otherwise he was in front
swats a good length ball on off stump to mid-on. Eager to get on with the game, is Mukhtar. The kind of batsman who tears the leather off the ball

falls short of long-on! The slower ball has Mukhtar in the worst position possible. Searching for the back-foot biff through the off side, he's into the shot too early and the ball leaps off the splice of the bat down the ground. Doesn't carry far enough though
back of a length and outside off, blocked
good length on off stump, safely kept out
full on off stump, he gets the drive in response. Places it to the left of mid-off to snatch a single
short and the angle from the left-armer over the wicket helps Shehzad slice it behind point
short and outside off again, Mukhtar keeps still and lashes it behind point. Ample power behind it to beat deep third man
the overcorrection goes wrong. Full delivery slinks down the leg side and the batsman's flick can't connect
edged, but it's a very thick one, also it has all of Mukhtar's strength behind it. Only the slightest hint of width and he went after it. Full blooded drive becomes a four through third man
that's neatly done. Vitori goes short and at the body, but Mukhtar has nudged it calmly to the fine leg boundary
back of a length and angling away outside off, Mukhtar pushes and gets beaten
stray ball down leg, Shehzad can't help it away. Off the thigh to the keeper
slower delivery, Shehzad winds up for a big hit, he is early into shot, this one runs fine on the off side off the thigh for 4 leg byes
pre-meditated and effected. Shehzad walks across off and flicks it away over backward square leg. The fielder dives to his left in the deep and lets it slip through him
leg-stumpish ball, he can't put it away with a glance. Manages an inside edge behind the wicket

dropped by Williams at backward point. Width on offer outside off, Mukhtar backs away, makes additional room and cuts it in the air. Williams can't take it, he just palms it away. How much will it cost Zimbabwe?
on a good length and on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on
flat on middle, driven back to the bowler
fraction short on middle, turned to midwicket off the back foot
low full toss on middle, right in the zone to be put away. Instead he sweeps it straight to backward square leg
Shehzad makes room by stepping away and thrashes this flat length ball outside off to the backward point boundary
pushed through shorter on the pads, pulled to deep square leg
Shehzad uses his feet, Williams is wary of it as he shortens his length. Punched to long-off
dug in shortish and outside off, he leans back and nails a cut to backward point, where Williams makes a diving save
back of a length and angling away outside off, he cuts and does not connect
half-volley outside off, Shehzad slams it straight to mid-off
back of a length and on middle, swung away to the right of mid-on, beats deep midwicket as well. Full marks for placement...

Vitori strikes as Shehzad picks out mid-off. This was a well-directed short ball outside off, has ample legs on it to surprise the batsman. He aims for a pull, hit high on the bat as he splices it to Sibanda at mid-off
back of a length and on off, he comes forward and presses it to covers
darted short on the pads, he does not get hold of the glance
fuller on leg, whippily driven to long-on
short and on middle, slogged away to deep midwicket
pitched up on the leg stump, he goes for another almighty swing and only manages an inside edge onto the pad
down the track, takes it on the full and drives it to mid-off, who dives and takes pace off the ball
Nauman makes room outside leg, Williams follows him, this full toss is driven to mid-off
Utseya starts off with a tripe long-hop, he rocks back and smacks a pull to the deep midwicket boundary
short on middle and leg, worked away backward of square leg. A direct hit could have consumed Nauman
another shorter one, the line is outside off, slapped to the left of Utseya, who leaps up and finger-tips it away to long-off
darted down leg, Mukhtar misses the sweep. Wide called
dug in on a back of a length and outside off, Mukhtar goes deep in the crease and punches it to sweeper cover
slog-swept away to deep backward square leg. A sloppy effort from Vitori gives the hosts a couple
back of a length and outside off, hoisted over the bowler's head. Bisects mid-on and mid-off
fraction short on middle, he shifts his balance onto the back foot and pulls it. Long-on - Masakadza - dives to his right and parries it to deep midwicket
Mukhtar makes room outside leg, having enough leverage to thump a lofted-drive over the covers
down the track, gets a very full ball, which is drilled to long-on
lobbed up outside off, Nauman sinks to one knee and slog-sweeps it fiercely over wide long-on
unfurls the reverse sweep now. Pushed through straighter, he connects well and sends it over short third man
Mukhtar steps away outside leg, Creamer pushes a legbreak outside off, he cuts and misses
heading down leg, Utseya escapes punishment. Glanced straight to the man at 45
dragged short, pulled behind square on the leg side
Sibanda takes it at long-on! This was a nothing ball, shortish and outside off. Nauman wants to smash it over long-on. He does not enough enough power on it, mistiming it  to Sibanda
back of a length and on middle, punched back to the bowler
similar line and length, punched to cow corner
dug in short again, width on offer, forced past the covers
looped up generously on off, forward and pressed to the covers
quicker legbreak outside off, chopped towards cover-point
clipped away off the pads behind square on the leg side
darted short on middle, he backs away and cuts it to the covers, finds the fielder
flicked away off the pads through backward square leg
short, parcelled up and dispatched and that ruins what could have been a tight over. On of, he rocks back and pulls it powerfully to the right of long-on
he makes room, Utseya follows him. Forced down to long-off
dragged short, he goes on the back foot and pulls it to deep midwicket
Mukhtar makes room outside leg, Utseya chases him with a short ball. He splices a pull to long-on

sharp piece of work from Utseya off his own bowling! Malik steps down the track, Utseya is aware of it as he pulls his length back. Punched back at the bowler, who moves to his right, makes a one-handed stop and lets rip a direct hit. Malik can't make his ground in time
pitched up and outside off, driven away to sweeper cover
Mukhtar steps away outside leg, this is a short one following the batsman. Swung away in front of square on the leg side
flat on off, chopped to short third man
veering onto the pads, nudged to the man at 45
he nips down the track, Raza pulls his length back. Mukhtar looks to turn to leg and gets a leading edge to long-off
width on offer outside off, Umar leans back and cuts it to backward point
back-to-back fifties for Mukhtar. More width on offer outside off, his eyes lit up as he slashed it in the gap at backward point
slid flat on off, dragged to the leg side off the inner part of the bat. Mukhtar calls for two and gets it
full on middle and leg, whipped away. Sibanda dives to his right at long-on and keeps it to two
he makes ample room outside leg, Utseya chases him. Swung away to long-on
length on middle, pushed to the left of midwicket
dropped... Poor ball, poor effort in the deep. Short on the leg stump, he goes for a pull. Mpofu dives forward and puts it down at deep backward square leg
down the track and drilled to long-on
Umar Akmal makes room and goes inside-out over the covers for a couple
low full toss on the leg stump, paddled fine on the leg side
he brings out the reverse sweep and scoops it over extra-cover

Mukhtar gone now... Tossed up on the leg stump, he loads up to lift it over long-on. Ends up finding Sibanda there.. Dolly catch, no errors here. And with that Sibanda becomes the first Zimbabwe player to take three catches in a T20 International
tickled to short fine leg off the pads. It came off an inside edge
flat on middle and leg, Umar camps back and punches it to cow corner
fuller length on middle, Umar gets under it and whacks it away between deep midwicket and long-on. Good connection
Boom goes Afridi. On a length and outside off, Afridi steps away and launches it over extra cover for six

Afridi's attempted encore fails. Mid-on and mid-off converge, almost collide. Raza moves to his left from mid-on and pouches it safely. Big blow for the hosts. Lala made room again, Williams bowled it flat and full on off, he sliced it high in the air. Well-judged catch from Raza

Chibhabha takes the catch, loses his balance and goes over the ropes... Almost a wicket. This was slid through flatter, Akmal rocks back and pulls it over midwicket. Chibhabha can't quite pull off the catch. He couldn't hold his balance. The outcome is a six
nudged off the pads to short fine leg
pushed through, swept behind square for one
pushed to point for a single
back of a length and angling away outside off, Umar punches and hits Rizwan at the other end
down the track and drags this from outside off to long-on off the toe-end of the bat
back of a length and sliding away outside off, late-cut away to deep third man
width on offer outside off, Umar smears it over the covers for two
length and outside off, hoisted over mid-on. There is protection in the deep, though
short and wide outside off, he aims for a cut and chops it towards point
back of a length slower one outside off. Umar leans back and cuts it to backward point
slower bouncer outside off, Umar can't dab it to third man. Coventry endures a bad bounce and is beaten as well
half-volley outside off, skelped to the covers. Chigu dives to his left at the covers and makes a superb save
clears the man at long-off. Too full on off, Umar has ample time to get under it and loft it up and over long-off

Mpofu pins Umar Akmal lbw for 30. Change of pace, low full toss on middle, Umar is early into the slog and does not connect. Trapped plumb in front of middle. Undone by the slower one. The bowler collapses in his followthrough and celebrates
Mpofu slides a short ball down leg, helped to long leg wit a pull
fuller and on off, tucked to the leg side for only single. Anwar Ali slipped and that foiled the possibility of a single
full on middle and leg, tucked through midwicket

Anwar Ali charges down the track and perishes to a full toss. Can Zimbabwe pull off an upset? Anwar swings hard but connect connect. Williams rattles the base of the leg stump. Anwar shakes his head as he walks back to the hut
length on middle, driven to long-on for one
Rizwan makes room outside leg, the bowler follows him. Clipped to long-on. Rizwan wants two but is sent back. He dives and returns to safety
flat on middle and leg, tucked in front of square on the leg side. This time they take two
full and straight, he twirls his wrists and flicks it behind square on the leg side for a couple

Top catch from Raza.. Crucial wicket for Zimbabwe. This was on a back of a length and outside off, slower in pace, Rizwan goes across the line and slogs it. Raza runs in from deep midwicket, hurls himself forward and snaffles a good catch. Mpofu looks skywards and thumps his chest.
full and outside off, stops on Wasim. Chipped through point
leg-side wide. Bhatti misses the glance
short and outside off, chopped to point for one
Immad shuffles around the crease, aims for a lap-sweep against this full toss. Makes a mess off it and ends up scooping it to the left of the bowler
change of pace outside off, hoodwinks Immad, who nips down the track. Swipes and does not connect
Lahore finds its voice again. What a strike from Bhatti. On a length and outside off, he loads up and tonks it over long-on
yorker outside off, Bhatti makes room, reaches out and can't slice it away
pitched up and outside off, he throws his bat at it and slices it over backward point. Raza moves to his right and makes a fine stop

Bhatti finishes it for Pakistan with a four. The Gaddafi raises itself to a roar. Joyous scenes in the crowd. Low full toss on off, driven crisply past the covers. Vitori did not nail the yorker. Pakistan take the series 2-0!
